title: Modern Residential Duplex
description: A contemporary two-story residential duplex featuring vertical gardens, open balconies, and eco-friendly elements, situated in a lush, urban environment.

title: Community Mosque
description: A three-story mosque featuring traditional Islamic architectural elements with intricate brickwork and perforated screen designs. Designed to serve as a religious and educational hub for the local community.

title: Shop Interior Design
description: A modern coffee shop interior design featuring a stylish wooden lattice partition, pendant lighting, sleek furniture, and wall art. The space combines functionality with a cozy and contemporary aesthetic, perfect for work and relaxation.

title: Modern Living-Dining Interior
description: A modern open-concept living and dining area featuring elegant wood paneling, geometric room dividers, soft neutral tones, and layered lighting design. The space blends comfort with contemporary aesthetics.

title: Modern Open Concept Living Space
description: An interior shot of a modern open-concept living and dining area in a residential setting, featuring minimalist furniture, recessed lighting, and a neutral color palette with dark grey sofas and a light wood dining set. Green plants add a touch of nature.
location: Not specified, but representative of modern urban homes

title: Modern Multi-Story Residence
description: An exterior view of a modern multi-story residential building featuring a white facade with contrasting red panel accents. The design incorporates multiple balconies with stone railings and a prominent white pergola structure over the entrance. Set against a clear blue sky and green lawn.
location: Not specified, but representative of modern suburban architecture

title: Contemporary Apartment Building
description: A striking modern apartment building with multiple floors, featuring a white facade contrasted with dark brown brickwork and vertical wooden slats. The structure includes numerous balconies with brown railings and large windows, surrounded by green landscaping and trees under a clear blue sky.
location: Not specified, suitable for urban or suburban developments

title: Modern Suburban House with Greenery
description: A modern two-story suburban house with a grey brick texture and white architectural accents. The property features a well-maintained green lawn, a patterned driveway, and a variety of trees and shrubs. The design includes a covered porch entrance and multiple large windows and balconies, all under a dynamic cloudy sky.
location: Not specified, typical of modern residential areas

title: Nurjahan Khusru Adarsha High School Entrance
description: The main entrance of Nurjahan Khusru Adarsha High School in Kalhati, Tangail. The design features a prominent archway with the school's name, flanked by modern vertical slat pillars and a security gate. The surrounding perimeter wall incorporates white panels with vertical green and brick accents, all set amidst lush green landscaping and trees under a dark blue sky.
